order

Class OrderItemView

  • java.lang.Object
    • product.Product
      • product.CatalogItem
        • order.OrderItemView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CatalogItem>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomItemView

    public class OrderItemView
extends CatalogItem
    The class that holds the data to be shown in the items to order TableView
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        productColor - The product dominate color
